knimeNode.name: RDKit Two Component Reaction
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies a reaction to two input SMILES or RDKit molecule columns

fullDescription.intro:
Applies a reaction to two input SMILES or molecule columns.
The output table contains a row for each product produced by applying the reaction to the inputs.
Each row contains the product molecule, index information, and the reactant molecules that were used.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the first reactant molecules as either SMILES or RDKit Molecules
The column containing the second reactant molecules as either SMILES or RDKit Molecules

A reaction SMARTS describing the reaction.
For a description of the format, please see Chapter 2 of the RDKit Book: http://rdkit.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/rdkit/trunk/Docs/Book/RDKit_Book.pdf

If checked, each reactant 1 will be combined with each reactant 2 yielding the combinatorial expansion of the reactants. If not checked, reactants 1 and 2 will be combined sequentially, with the longer list determining the number of output rows.
